results.description: Australia batsman Marnus Labuschagne signs a new contract with Glamorgan after his starring role in the Ashes series against England.
results.title: Marnus Labuschagne: Glamorgan sign Australia batsman to two-year deal

results.description: Worcestershire sign Australia international batsman Ashton Turner for their T20 Blast campaign in 2020.
results.shortTitle: Worcs sign Australia's Turner for T20
results.title: Ashton Turner: Worcestershire sign Australia batsman for T20 Blast

results.description: Glamorgan re-appoint Matthew Maynard as head coach for the next three years after an interim role in 2019.
results.title: Matthew Maynard: Glamorgan re-appoint coach on three-year deal

results.description: Pakistan leg-spinner Shadab Khan and Australian batsman D'Arcy Short will play in next year's T20 Blast.
results.shortTitle: Surrey sign Shadab and Short for T20
results.title: Surrey: Shadab Khan and D'Arcy Short join Surrey for T20 Blast in 2020

results.description: Glamorgan hand new one-year contracts to keeper-batsman Tom Cullen and all-rounder Owen Morgan.
results.shortTitle: New Glam deals for Cullen and Morgan
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: New contracts for Cullen and Morgan

results.description: England left-arm fast bowler Tymal Mills extends his Twenty20 contract with Sussex.
results.shortTitle: Sussex bowler Mills extends T20 deal
results.title: Tymal Mills: Sussex fast bowler extends T20 contract

thumbnail.altText: Tymal Mills in action for Sussex Sharks

results.description: Glamorgan announce a contract extension for Graham Wagg and remain hopeful of re-signing Australian star Marnus Labuschagne.
results.shortTitle: New Glamorgan deal for all-rounder Wagg
results.title: Glamorgan: New deal for all-rounder Graham Wagg

results.description: Glamorgan veteran Michael Hogan is awarded a testimonial season by the county, but rules himself out of the new Hundred competition.
results.title: Glamorgan Cricket: Michael Hogan awarded testimonial

results.description: Glamorgan's former South Africa fast bowler Marchant de Lange signs a new two-year contract at the club.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan's De Lange signs new contract
results.title: Marchant de Lange: Glamorgan hand new deal to ex-South Africa paceman

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Simon Harmer puts in a man-of-the-match performance with three wickets and three late boundaries as Essex Eagles lift the T20 trophy for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Harmer inspires Essex Eagles to T20 Blast final win
results.title: T20 Blast final highlights: Simon Harmer leads Essex Eagles to win over Worcestershire Rapids

results.description: Essex Eagles beat Worcestershire Rapids by four wickets to win the T20 Blast for the first time in their history.
results.shortTitle: Essex beat Worcs to win maiden T20 Blast
results.title: T20 Blast final: Essex Eagles beat Worcestershire Rapids to win title for first time

results.description: Simon Harmer finds the boundary off the last ball of the match to spark wild celebrations as Essex Eagles win the T20 Blast title for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Harmer wins T20 Blast final for Essex Eagles with final-ball boundary
results.title: T20 Blast: Essex Eagles win final thanks to Simon Harmer's last-ball four

results.description: Essex will play Worcestershire in the T20 Blast final after beating Derbyshire in Saturday's second semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Essex set up T20 Blast final with Worcs
results.title: T20 Blast Finals Day: Essex Eagles beat Derbyshire Falcons to reach final

results.description: Defending champions Worcestershire Rapids defend 11 off the final two overs to beat Notts Outlaws by one run in a thrilling T20 Blast semi-final.
results.shortTitle: Defending champions Worcs beat Notts in semi
results.title: T20 Blast Finals Day: Worcestershire Rapids beat Notts Outlaws by one run in semi

results.description: Worcestershire Rapids beat Notts Outlaws by one run as Wayne Purnell bowls a dot ball to see his side progress to the final of the T20 Blast at Edgbaston.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Rapids reach T20 Blast final with dramatic last-ball win
results.title: T20 Blast finals: Worcestershire Rapids beat Notts Outlaws by one run

results.description: Worcestershire bid to become the first team to retain English cricket's T20 title, but can Notts, Essex or Derbyshire stop them?
results.shortTitle: Worcestershire aim to make T20 history
results.title: T20 Blast Finals Day: Will Worcestershire, Notts, Essex or Derbyshire win at Edgbaston?

results.description: Relive T20 Blast Finals Day as Essex Eagles beat Worcestershire Rapids to win the title for the first time.
results.title: Relive T20 Blast Finals Day

results.description: Which England player captained 2018's winners? And who won the mascot race? Test your knowledge of T20 Finals Day.
results.shortTitle: Test your knowledge of T20 Finals Day
results.title: T20 Blast quiz: How much do you know about Finals Day?

results.description: Watch as Derbyshire Falcons produce a masterclass to beat Gloucestershire by seven wickets in the T20 Blast quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: Derbyshire produce masterclass to reach T20 Blast Finals Day
results.title: T20 Blast: Derbyshire reach Finals Day for first time
